title: Genasys Protect
description:
• Unified Alerts
Experience seamless communication by receiving alerts from leading mass notification systems, GP Alert and EVAC, all within a single app. There is no need for multiple apps or installations for different locations or counties – our app consolidates alerts for a unified experience.

• Instant Geo-Located Emergency Notifications
Receive real-time alerts directly from local authorities to your mobile device without the hassle of logging into multiple emergency platforms. With location services enabled, you can stay informed even while traveling and will  automatically receive alerts from partnered areas.

• Multi-Location Safety
Safeguard your loved ones by effortlessly saving and managing multiple locations within the app.
descriptionHTML:
• Unified Alerts
Experience seamless communication by receiving alerts from leading mass notification systems, GP Alert and EVAC, all within a single app. There is no need for multiple apps or installations for different locations or counties – our app consolidates alerts for a unified experience.

• Instant Geo-Located Emergency Notifications
Receive real-time alerts directly from local authorities to your mobile device without the hassle of logging into multiple emergency platforms. With location services enabled, you can stay informed even while traveling and will automatically receive alerts from partnered areas.

• Multi-Location Safety
Safeguard your loved ones by effortlessly saving and managing multiple locations within the app.
summary: Stay safe in an emergency and get zone alerts from local emergency officials
